summary: Completed comprehensive testing of admin user creation functionality. Backend API fully functional with all security measures. Frontend UI working with minor role selector interaction issue.

ui_bugs.issue: Modal overlay intercepts clicks on role dropdown, causing timeout
ui_bugs.workaround: Form still submits with default role, functionality not broken

passed_tests: Nuevo Usuario button visible for admin role
All form fields present (name, email, password, role)
Form submission works with success message
New user appears in users table
Backend API POST /api/auth/register-admin works for admin
Backend API supports all user roles
Created users can be deleted by admin
Users list endpoint shows created users
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor UI fix needed: Role selector dropdown in user creation dialog has modal overlay interception issue. Consider adding force=true to dropdown clicks or adjusting z-index of dropdown menu.
